name: parenthetical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A parenthetical remark is said in addition to the main part of what you are saying or writing.

Related word
parenthetically
Add to word list
Add to word list
written in parentheses, or said in addition to the main part of what you are saying: He added a parenthetical comment to his original statement.
